entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm.
